text.title: How to Upload YouTube VIdeos to get more VIEWS
text.p: you could be missing out on a ton of
views simply because you are not
uploading your YouTube videos the right
way my goal for you is that by the end
of this video you have a short quick
simple checklist so that you can always
upload your videos the right way in a
small amount of time and this is day
nine of my YouTube challenge where I
have challenged myself to upload a video
every day and I'm inviting you to do the
same you don't have to upload every day
but you can use my videos to help you
get your channel up and running or
breathe some life back into it step one
on our uploading checklist is something
most creators don't do even though it
can get them a lot more views because
most creators don't know about this but
the catch is you have to do this before
you add your video to your channel
because once it is uploaded you cannot
change this let me show you what I mean
by using an old video of mine as an
example you see right over here where it
says file name that right there three
steps does not help the algorithm know
what my video is about it also does not
help Google know what this video is
about because if you are more strategic
with your file name you are more likely
to show up in search not only on YouTube
but also on Google but I can't change
this it's too late it's already been
done now you don't need to necessarily
use the exact title of the video for
this file name but you can but what you
need to do is before you ever upload
that video change the file name to a
title that has keywords and it describes
what it is that you're actually talking
about one way to come up with a title is
to put in the keywords that your video
is about so let's say it is empty nest
syndrome now you can look at all of the
Search terms that people are using when
they search this topic let's say it's
about emptiness syndrome for single moms
then I want to look for videos that did
well here's one with 2,000 views and
when we look at it she only has 302
subscribers so that video did really
well for her and the title was how to
prepare for an empty nest as a single
parent hello so prepare for an empty
nest and single parent those are all
keywords that tells the algorithm
exactly what this video is about you
could actually use that title for the
title of your video but definitely you
could use this for the file name of your
video as you can see on my video from
yesterday I have changed the file name
right here uploading daily for 7 Days
change my YouTube but the next thing you
need to do on your checklist is you also
have to change the file name of your
thumbnail again you can't do that once
it's been uploaded so it has to happen
before you upload your thumbnail to this
video as you can see I changed the file
name in my computer before I uploaded
right here and then right here this is
the thumbnail changed that title as well
next thing you're going to do when you
go to upload your video is you're going
to make sure you have that title there
and you are using keywords that tells
people and the algorithm what this video
is about then you're going to write a
two to three sentence description it
does not need to be long usually I take
a different version of the title and
make that my first sentence and then I
simply break down what this video is
about using keywords but not packing it
so much that it doesn't sound
conversational if you are running a
business you do want to offer some of
your freebies and some of your paid
offers as well as any affiliate links
and an easy way to do this so you're not
having to retype it every single time is
simply go to settings in your account go
to upload defaults and now you can write
out that description so that this
automatically appears every time you go
to upload a video next thing you need to
make sure you are doing is using
playlist so right here I have checked
off my YouTube challenge as the playlist
because the algorithm likes this and
people like it too it's going to get
people watching more and more of your
videos when you start to utilize
playlist then you also can set this in
your default settings I have it so that
automatically tells the algorithm every
single time I upload that no this video
is not for kids because if you put it it
is made for kids it's only going to send
it to kids then you want to hit show
more and you want to go down here and
say no I've not altered any content
unless you have used Ai and changed
people's appearances and things like
that I always have allow automatic
chapters on and key moments because
that's going to help me with search I
also have automatic places Concepts and
then down here this is where you can add
your tags that again tells the algorithm
what this video is all about you should
use as many of the 500 characters as you
can the 400 range is good I clearly only
went with 225 in this one but you can't
go over 500 after that I make sure that
I allow embedding again this is
automatically defaulted to this allow
video and audio remixing and then this
is important you want the category
selected on this video this is a how to
video so I have selected how to if you
have an entertainment Channel make sure
that it's selected to entertainment or
an education but if it's a tutorial you
want it to be how to because that's
going to tell the algorithm what type of
video this is I have comments on
obviously you want engagement if you're
monetized you want to select on and then
done then if your video is over 8
minutes then you want to go into review
placement and you can add breaks within
the video and even determine when they
are going to appear this allows you to
make more money off of that video when
you add breaks and then if you add it
yourself then you can determine where
those breaks will be versus YouTube
doing it and then you risk it being in
an awkward
place then hit
next this is when you are going to
review and make sure that nothing
offensive is in the video and you select
none of the above and then you're going
to select submit rating which I had
already done then hit
next I don't do anything here except I
do add an in screen and I always add the
option of video and the Subscribe you
only want one video If you give people
too many options they're less likely to
click on anything and we want them to
watch another one of your videos so you
have the option to go in and they can
select a video the algorithm can select
a video or your last video before this
one but I like to select the video
myself that way I know exactly what that
video is because at the end of my videos
I am specifically referencing that video
in the box so I like to select the video
and again we do that because we want
people to watch more of our videos once
that's done you hit
save then you hit
next and right here this is important
you don't ever want to hit unlisted
because it can actually tell the
algorithm that the video is not doing
well and it will send it to fewer people
people you also don't want to hit public
because we want to make sure we get to
see it before it goes out to the public
so you're either going to hit private or
you're going to schedule this video to
go out at a specific time right now I've
got it to private that way I can check
it make sure everything is how I want it
to be that it's in the highdefinition
version when it's up there and then I
will publish it to public one last thing
that will help you with your views is
when you go to post your video post a
call call to action in your comments and
pin it to the top this can be a call to
action to a link to another video or to
an offer that you have or it can simply
be you asking a question so that they
are more likely to comment all you have
to do is once you write out your comment
you hit the three dots on the
side
pin and now that comment is at the very
top once you get this checklist down you
will be optimizing your video so that
you can get more views and you'll be
able to do it quick
this is the exact process I'm using to
help me not only optimize my videos to
get more views to grow my channel but
also so that I can be consistent by
simplifying my process and in the next
video when it's available you will see
my process of how I create my thumbnails
and how I create my titles to get more
clicks on my videos
